Package com.msc.serverbrowser.gui.components

Class SampServerTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • javafx.scene.control.TableView<SampServer>
              • com.msc.serverbrowser.gui.components.SampServerTable

  • public class SampServerTable
extends javafx.scene.control.TableView<SampServer>
    TableView that was made for the ServerList View, contains a special TableRowFactory and allows filtering and sorting.
    Since:
    23.09.2017
    Author:
    Marcel
